constructor-arg.name: command
constructor-arg.value: -v -c eu.stratosphere.procrustes.experiments.operator.stats.HeavyHitter ${app.path.apps}/tamaras-msc-thesis-flink-jobs-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ${system.hadoop-2.path.input}/operatorstats/${datagen.path} --cardinality ${operator.stats.cardinality} --fraction ${operator.stats.fraction} --error ${operator.stats.error}

constructor-arg.name: command
constructor-arg.value: -v -c eu.stratosphere.procrustes.experiments.operator.stats.CountDistinct ${app.path.apps}/tamaras-msc-thesis-flink-jobs-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ${system.hadoop-2.path.input}/operatorstats/${datagen.path}

constructor-arg.name: config
constructor-arg.value: # common system parameters system.default.config.parallelism.total = 160 system.default.config.slaves = ${env.hosts.slaves.only20} # experiment parameters operator.stats.fraction = 0.005 operator.stats.error = 0.0025 operator.stats.cardinality = 40000000000 # datagen parameters datagen.path = 40B datagen.tuples.per.task = 250000000 datagen.distribution = "TruncIntPareto[1,100000]"
